homepageDescription: Orange provides several accessibility assessment grids through its validation tool La va11ydette.
versionAlert1: This audit is not based on the latest version of the guidelines
versionAlert2: Your compliance rate will be calculated using version 1.3
auditTxt4: Compliance rate by pages according to the two levels of criteria A and AA
showAudit: View the results of the audit
openPageUrl: Open the url of the current page (new window)
saveDownloadJson: Save and download in JSON format
importError: The JSON file is not compatible with import
importErrorEmpty: You must fill in a JSON file before importing
name: Name
issueTxt3: Please confirm the removal of the anomaly:
filterFeedback2: tests meet the selected filter criteria
deleteAsk: Are you sure you want to remove the audit
projectNameError: The Organization Name field is required
projectSiteNameError: The field Project name or URL is required
dateError: The field Date is required, it must be in the format
statementTxt2: XML export is only available for completed audits
statementTxt3: Leave the "name" field empty, to delete the item from the list after saving.
statementTxt4: Import the data from a statement saved in JSON format, or enter the information directly in the "Manual data entry" part.
formPrefillDesc: Import the data from a declaration saved in JSON format, or fill in the information directly in the "Complete the data" part.
manualDataEntryDesc: Complete or modify the data of the declaration.
fieldRequired: All required fields are marked with *
accessibilityPlanText:
[Name of the organization] undertakes to make its websites internet, intranet, extranet and its mobile applications accessible in accordance with article 47 of Law No. 2005-102 of February 11, 2005.

To this end, it implements the following strategy and actions [links to the multi-annual plan and to the action plan for the current year including a review of actions carried out in the previous year].

This accessibility statement applies to [Project name or URL].
noncompliantDesc: Check this checkbox only if you want to generate a non-compliant statement of an uncompleted audit.
textService: Contact [Name of the entity responsible for the online service] [url of a page with the entity’s contact details]
xmlBtn: Export the statement in XML format
htmlBtn: Export the statement in HTML format
auditWarning: These results are not exhaustive. The cases noted are given by way of example, in order to illustrate the issues. It is the project team's responsibility to apply these fixes systematically to all similar cases.
autocheckTxt1: This test is linked to the previous page
autocheckTxt2: Automatically apply this result to next page.
autocheckTxtError: Warning, you have just modified a criterion linked to the previous page, this link and that of the following pages no longer exists.
autocheckModalTxt: Do you want to apply the result of this criterion to all subsequent pages?
autocheckModalTxt2: If you answer no, the result will be applied only on the next page.

title.footerLinkGit: Report an error on GitHub (new window)

statementTemplate.title: Accessibility statement
statementTemplate.compliantContent2: to the criteria with WCAG version 2.2, level AA
statementTemplate.method: The audit was carried out via la Va11ydette.
statementTemplate.linkRGAAWCAG: refers to the WCAG international recommendations. Here is the correspondence link between the RGAA and the WCAG (french).
statementTemplate.blockingPoint1: blocking point(s) from a user point of view
statementTemplate.approvalHeading: Formal approval of this accessibility statement
statementTemplate.wcagVersion: WCAG version 2.2, level AA
statementTemplate.environmentContent: The verifications were performed with the following software combinations:
statementTemplate.methodsHeading: Methods and Tools to evaluate accessibility
statementTemplate.pagesHeading: Pages which have been the subject of compliance verification
statementTemplate.pagesContent: The verification audit was performed on the following pages using the Orange va11ydette:
statementTemplate.resultsContent1: The compliance audit carried out by
statementTemplate.resultsContent2: % of WCAG level A and AA criteria are met.
statementTemplate.resultsContent2bis: The average compliance rate of the online service is
statementTemplate.resultsContent4: blocking point(s) from a user point of view
statementTemplate.resultsContent5: The table presents by audited page the number of criteria compliant, non-compliant, not applicable according to level A or AA. The last column mentions the compliance rate of the page which is equal to the number of compliant criteria divided by the number of applicable criteria.
statementTemplate.noncompliancestext: The contents listed below are not accessible for the following reasons.
statementTemplate.exemptionsHeading: Content not subject to accessibility obligation
statementTemplate.contactsText: If you are unable to access content or a service, you can contact the site manager to be directed to an accessible alternative or obtain the content in another form.
statementTemplate.legalContent: You have reported to the website manager an accessibility problem that prevents you from accessing content or one of the portal's services and you have not received a satisfactory response, in this case:
statementTemplate.legalList1: Write a message to the Defender of Rights.
statementTemplate.legalList2: Or contact the Defender of Rights delegate in your department.
statementTemplate.legalList3:
Or send a letter by post (free of charge, do not put a stamp)
Défenseur des droits
Free answer 71120
75342 Paris CEDEX 07
